title: Water from the Rock and Moses’ Sin
summary: Numbers 20 includes several key events: the death of Miriam, the people’s complaint for water, Moses striking the rock instead of speaking to it (disobeying God), and the death of Aaron. Because of Moses’ sin, he is barred from entering the Promised Land.

faq.question: What did Moses do wrong at the rock?
faq.answer: He struck the rock in anger instead of speaking to it as God commanded.

faq.question: What was the consequence of Moses’ disobedience?
faq.answer: He was not allowed to enter the Promised Land.
